page.title: 17Stillingfleet public house
page.content: The Cross Keys, public house, is owned by Samuel Smith's brewery of Tadcaster. The manager lives on the premises. There is one bar where good bar meals are served daily. Regular customers have one darts team in the winter league, two in the summer and a ladies team. There are also two dominoes teams. Recently the number of customers has been increased by the opening of the Stillingfleet coalmine. For the enjoyment of the customers there is a pool table, a juke box and a fruit machine.
